name: Wings 2: Aces High
description:
Wings 2: Aces High (スカイミッション, lit. "Sky Mission") is the Super Nintendo Entertainment System sequel to the Amiga game Wings that takes place during World War I (though the developer is Malibu, rather than Cinemaware). The game was sold in Europe as Blazing Skies.

A realistic aerodynamics system is used in the game that replicates the physics of a First World War biplane. Many of the loop-de-loops that are possible in modern aircraft were not possible given the limited speed and velocity of the early 20th century flying machines.
